title: The Egg
author: The Egg
content: üê£Welcome to The Egg! üê£¬†The First 24/7 Egg Livestream ¬†Powered by the Ethereum Blockchain, we aim to do what has never been done before - livestream an egg for 24 hours a day. Breaking the limits of what was previously thought to be possible, The Egg will disrupt the cryptocurrency market and revolutionize modern finance.üê£ www.theeggstream.comüê£ twitch.tv/theeggstreamüê£ twitter.com/theeggstreamüê£ t.me/theeggstreamWe are launching our stream and token soon.We‚Äôre hiring! Interested to join the team and help out? Join t.me/theeggstream and reach out!

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.created_time: July 29, 2023, 08:40:06 PMLast edit: July 30, 2023, 08:36:09 PM by Stalker22
comments.body: Wait, what? Livestream an egg for 24 hours a day? What am I missing here?Quote from: The Egg on July 29, 2023, 08:13:48 PMWe‚Äôre hiring! Interested to join the team and help out?Do you hire chickens?

comments.author: nutildah
comments.body: No but really, I'm curious why you need a token to do that ¬†Not going to even ask how it can "disrupt the cryptocurrency market and revolutionize modern finance" ¬†I assume its like a fertilized egg in an incubator and maybe we can place bets on the day its gonna hatch, lol. If its not, well I would imagine slowly the egg will rot and decay. Probably pretty smelly for whoever is around it.But if it is a live egg, what happens after it hatches? Project is over?

comments.author: rat4
comments.body: Anytime I can open a refrigerator and watch eggs, bacon chain, proof of steak.

comments.author: KiranKBS
comments.body: Well, well, well, folks! Who needs Elon Musk or Warren Buffett when you can have the charismatic "Egg-coin"? üòÇ Never short of ideas!

comments.author: Jegileman
comments.body: I‚Äôm just too curious to know what your project is aim at. Please when is the launching? Streaming an egg for 24 hours‚Ä¶really? Who does that? So when I stream egg for 24 hours, what do i get in return? This just sounds like someone trying to break a record in the genius book of records.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: Jegileman on July 31, 2023, 09:05:37 PMI‚Äôm just too curious to know what your project is aim at. Please when is the launching? Streaming an egg for 24 hours‚Ä¶really? Who does that? So when I stream egg for 24 hours, what do i get in return? This just sounds like someone trying to break a record in the genius book of records.Sound like a joke coin project to me, because from all indications, this project cannot provide the service it promises and this is something we have to look away from in most cases at a time, instead of focusing on the profit and empty promises the coin made for investors, I am yet to see what the unique feature is in this project that ops will say it will revolutionize the market..This won't be any different from all the shitcoins that we have around, that instead of focusing on developing a brand, there tend to compete or try to change the market without any capacity to do so.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: The Egg on July 29, 2023, 08:13:48 PM The Egg will disrupt the cryptocurrency market and revolutionize modern finance.This has been said so many times before and for all those who project who claim ended as a shitcoin, I stay away from projects that have the word revolutionize and disrupt because all they can come out is liquidity, shill marketing, and a burning mechanism.QuoteWe are launching our stream and token soon.If this is what your platform can do better not to, it's not bring something revolutionary as you claim, since you have a token coming out better show who are the team behind this and your whitepaper as well, Let see if there's something revolutionary and how good your team are.
